0E594C80328C4EBAB1406A4C67CA5835.description: Comprehend appropriate conventions of informal and formal language: informal (e.g., use informal language and tone with familiar expressions and use words like ‚Äút√∫‚Äù); and, formal (e.g., use formal language and tone with formal expressions and use words like ‚Äúusted, vosotros‚Äù).
